amendment.description: Amendment provides $1 million to expand the Bureau of Alcohol, Tobacco and Firearms Youth Crime Gun Interdiction Initiative.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funds for the Youth Gun Crimes Prevention Initiative and by $1 million and reduce funds for the Inspector General of the Treasury comensurately.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Blagojevich amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
